com.tigertext.ttandroid.sse

Class BatchUpdateHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tigertext.ttandroid.sse.BatchUpdateHelper

  • public class BatchUpdateHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by carydobeck on 8/8/17.

    This class is intended to wrap all the batching logic into one easy to follow place, making sure that all work is held until the batch finishes.

    Batching should save the data to disk first, and then can ack events and publish any updates after

    Currently can batch: DB transactions event ids to ack unread counts for organizations pub subs

    Currently CAN'T batch: SharedPreferences editors

    IMPORTANT: NOT thread safe, all calls must be on the same thread due to DB transaction policy

        public void flushBatch(@Nullable

      • yieldAndFlushIfContended

        public boolean yieldAndFlushIfContended(long sleepAfterYieldDelay)
        Yield if there are any other threads asking to use the database
        Parameters:
        sleepAfterYieldDelay - a positive long in millis to yield for other transactions, or 0 if shouldn't wait extra time
        Returns:
        True if the transaction was yielded and a new transaction started, false if database didn't yield
